channel.title: Posts on Ethan Peterson's Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Ethan Peterson's Site

item.title: Introducing Myself
item.description: My name is Ethan Peterson. Born and raised in the small town of Stromsburg, Nebraska, approximately 15 minutes north of York on the prestigious Highway 81. I grew up in love with sports (specifically baseball) and the statistics that come with it. Die hard Yankees, Lakers, and Cornhuskers fan.
